items.name: Coder
items.title: - 100 Hour Film Race
items.technology: Adobe Premiere, After Effects, Adobe Photoshop
items.description: The 100 Hour Film Race is an international competition that challenges filmmakers around the world to create shorts (5 minutes and 30 seconds max.) in 100 hours based on a surprise theme, prop, and action assignment.
